emails.html_part:
Thanks for your notes back after we announced October 10th as the weekend for the 2014 CM Retreat - we share your excitement!
 
The retreat will be hosted in San Diego this year so we'll be able to enjoy some great weather as well as the company of friends.
↵↵
 
Please fill out the following very quick survey so we can get a headcount and begin planning appropriately: https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/L32DWK6
↵↵
 
 
We've received a couple of questions regarding the weekend:
- The retreat will officially kick off Friday, Oct 10 during the day, and last until Sunday, mid-day.
- There will be a cost for attending the event - $150 in order to help cover room and food. Once there, we hope to keep any other expenses you'll incurr to a minimum, so you can enjoy the weekend to the fullest.
↵↵
- Scholarships will be addressed at a later date, once we are able to confirm a budget and attendance.
- Significant others are invited - just make sure to let us know they're coming!
 
↵
↵Thanks again, and we look forward to seeing you all in October!

 

↵↵

2014 Planning Committee

↵↵

Sam, Ernestine, Tariq, Joe, Ana, Bethany, Varun, Garrett, and Ansaf

↵↵
 


--
Samantha A. Penabad
spenabad@gmail.com | (908) 962-7452↵
↵

emails.html_part:
Thanks, Samantha!
↵↵
Bit curious about the rationale to host the retreat in San Diego...
↵↵
Personally, I think it's a great city with lots to do, but I think folks might appreciate transparency about the process of selecting the host city. :)
↵↵
ᐧ
↵↵

↵↵
Thanks for your notes back after we announced October 10th as the weekend for the 2014 CM Retreat - we share your excitement!
↵↵
 
The retreat will be hosted in San Diego this year so we'll be able to enjoy some great weather as well as the company of friends.
↵↵
 
Please fill out the following very quick survey so we can get a headcount and begin planning appropriately: https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/L32DWK6
↵↵↵↵
 
 
We've received a couple of questions regarding the weekend:
- The retreat will officially kick off Friday, Oct 10 during the day, and last until Sunday, mid-day.
- There will be a cost for attending the event - $150 in order to help cover room and food. Once there, we hope to keep any other expenses you'll incurr to a minimum, so you can enjoy the weekend to the fullest.
↵↵↵↵
- Scholarships will be addressed at a later date, once we are able to confirm a budget and attendance.
- Significant others are invited - just make sure to let us know they're coming!
 
↵↵↵
↵Thanks again, and we look forward to seeing you all in October!

 

↵↵↵↵
